entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:19 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then northeast 40 gusting to 60. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard developing in the morning. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then clearing. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
